function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate thermal comfort in university facilities leading to discomfort for occupants.","Impact":"Reduced well-being and potential health issues for occupants.","Mitigation":"Regular monitoring of environmental conditions, implementing energy-efficient solutions, and adjusting heating systems as needed.","Technologies":"Smart sensors, IoT devices, energy-efficient heating systems, and building management systems.","People":"Occupants of university facilities.","Owner":"Facility management team and sustainability committee."},{"Description":"Waste of energy due to over-heated buildings and the need to open windows.","Impact":"Increased energy consumption and negative impact on sustainability and environmental goals.","Mitigation":"Implementing smart building technologies, improving insulation, and optimizing heating and ventilation systems.","Technologies":"Smart building automation systems, energy-efficient windows, and IoT-based environmental monitoring systems.","People":"Occupants of university facilities, sustainability committee, and facilities management team.","Owner":"Sustainability committee and facilities management team."},{"Description":"High energy consumption in buildings contributing to global energy consumption.","Impact":"Contributes to high global energy consumption and hinders progress towards environmental sustainability goals.","Mitigation":"Implementing energy-efficient solutions, optimizing building operations, and promoting responsible energy usage.","Technologies":"Energy management systems, smart meters, and IoT-based energy monitoring devices.","People":"Sustainability committee, facilities management team, and broader community.","Owner":"Facilities management team and sustainability committee."}]}
